title: december 13: the joy of (james dean drinking) pepsi
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the beginning of a short but legendary career: that of James Dean, who got his start acting in a Pepsi commercial. Then, she tells a story of a sinister plot against Justin Bieber. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
